flowContents.comments: This NiFi data pipeline is designed to extract data from Salesforce, perform the necessary data transformations, and load the refined dataset into a ClickHouse database
flowContents.name: Salesforce_to_Clickhouse

properties.RevenueIncreaseQuery:
SELECT
  Id,
  Name,
  Industry,
  AnnualRevenue,
  AnnualRevenue * 1.1 AS RevenueWithIncrease
FROM FLOWFILE

parameters.name: SalesforceQuery
parameters.value:
SELECT 
    Id,
    Name,
    Industry,
    Website,
    NumberOfEmployees,
    AnnualRevenue
FROM Account
WHERE DAY_ONLY(CreatedDate) = 2025-10-02
  AND Owner.Username = 'divija.garg613@agentforce.com'
